description:
I think Ryan looks younger than 22 for some reason. But he is certainly a mature guy. He has worked at the same job since he was 18, and seems to be nice stable guy. Very personable and grounded. He likes slightly older guys because they seem to have their act together like he does.
He was working the " I am Bi." thing, but I think he is playing for the gay team these days. Speaking of teams, he played soccer when he was younger and has a thing for jock-type guys. He still seems a little inexperienced sexually, but he knows for sure he likes to be on Top.
Though when I came up behind him to show off his amazing ass, his dick seemed to perk up. I think he might be down 'someday' to experiment with sitting on one, just as long as it isn't as hefty as his own thick uncut cock.
Ryan seems like a sweet guy who is still trying to figure things out sexually. Stay tuned next week as he tries to figure things out with our hot little red head Delaney. It is one of those Serviced videos that snowballed into something a bit more....interactive!
title: Ryan Cruce - Solo
